title: Starter Website Package
description: Perfect for freelancers, hobbyists, or startups needing a simple, professional online presence to showcase their work. This one-page site covers basic information and contact details.

title: Personal Blog Package
description: Ideal for bloggers or influencers looking to build an online community. This package provides a blog-friendly site with an easy-to-use CMS for managing content.

title: Small Business Website
description: Best suited for small businesses needing an online storefront or professional website with contact forms, testimonials, and service descriptions.

title: Advanced Blog Package
description: Great for content-heavy sites, media brands, or bloggers looking for a custom design with added animations and enhanced SEO.

title: Corporate Website Package
description: Designed for medium-sized businesses needing a professional site with custom features, animations, and scalable SEO.

title: E-Commerce Starter Package
description: A great fit for startups or small e-commerce businesses needing a functional online store with essential shopping features and SEO.

title: Custom Web Application
description: Suitable for businesses requiring a custom web app, such as an interactive user dashboard or booking system, with a CMS for easy content updates.

title: Advanced Corporate Package
description: Perfect for larger companies that need a corporate site with custom animations, enhanced user interaction, and in-depth SEO.

title: Standard E-Commerce Package
description: A robust solution for established e-commerce stores needing advanced features, such as product filters, custom checkout, and high-level SEO.

title: Professional Web Application
description: Suitable for growing businesses or platforms needing a scalable, multi-user web app, such as a CRM, with complex functionalities.

title: Enterprise Website Package
description: Comprehensive package for large enterprises needing a high-performance site with advanced animations, custom CMS, and extensive digital marketing support.

title: Interactive Brand Experience Package
description: Tailored for high-profile brands looking for an immersive, interactive website using 3D animations and custom interactions to engage users.
